Docs.summary: Manages the collection of space reservations made in a record sequence.

Docs.summary: Allows the to free resources before it is destroyed by the garbage collector.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void FreeReservation(int64 size) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub FreeReservation (size As Long)

Docs.param: The size of the reservation to release.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, releases a reservation of the specified size.

block.para:
When you inherit from , you must implement this method to actually release space in the record sequence. You should not call when this method is complete; that logic is handled for you.
When you free records, you must free the same records that you reserved together in a previous call to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance int64 GetBestMatchingReservation(int64 size) cil managed
Protected Function GetBestMatchingReservation (size As Long) As Long

Docs.param: The size of the reservation that must be fit.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the best matching reservation for a given size.
Docs.returns: A reservation from the collection that is greater than or equal to the specified size, or -1 if no such reservation exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is typically called when appending a record from reserved space to a record sequence. When it returns, a reservation of the returned size has been removed from the collection. If, for some reason, the reserved space is not actually accessed, the <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection.ReservationMade%2A> method should be called to ensure that the <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection> accurately represents the amount of reserved space in the record sequence.

Docs.exception:
The operation is invalid for one of the following reasons:
- The enumeration has ended.
- The collection has been modified.
- The enumeration has not been started. A call to must be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ReservationFreed(int64 size) cil managed

Docs.param: The size of the reservation that has been released.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, indicates that a reservation has been released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you inherit from <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection>, you must call this method when a reservation is released for a reason other than removing it from the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ReservationMade(int64 size) cil managed

Docs.param: The size of the reservation that has been made.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, indicates that a reservation has been made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you inherit from <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection>, you must call this method when a reservation is made outside of a call to <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection.Add%2A>.
